WorkItem.Description:
OK, I realize this might well be user error.  But the hunter stat calculations seem broken in my setup.
 
I'm using a survival build, and "update from character profiler".  But there are strange things going on with Relative Stat Values
and Gem calculations at the very least, and probably deeper problems too (equipment rankings don't make much sense to me).
 
I've attached a screen shot of relative stat values (stats.png) and gem rankings (test.png).  Notice how MP5 is ranked at -53.59.  I could see how MP5 might not be highly rated, but how could it be negative?  Agi is .52, but ranged AP is 17.47?  That doesn't seem right.
 
In addition the gems are strange too (test.png): Delicate Cardinal Rubies (20agi) is 7.51, Delicate Scarlet Ruby (16agi) is greater at 8.43, but Delicate Stormjewel (20agi again) is -20.26.

Comments.Message:
Everything you just said leads me to believe that you are sitting right on a tipping point where a slight change in any major stat would cause an ability to fire/not fire where it wouldn't otherwise, thereby drastically (+/- 20) changing your DPS. This is a side-effect of the present rotational method and I can't do anything about it until I completely rewrite the system, which I'm not read to do yet.

I'm going to close this issue as we already have Hunter issues open for similar circumstances.
Jothay, you could be right, but why would two otherwise identical (+20agi) gems have such different rantings?  That doesn't seem like a rotation edge effect...
Stormjewels have a limit 1, if you have another in your gear that could explain the 2nd not giving same DPS.
Agreed they are unique, but I don't have any.  Still smells like a bug.
